summary: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.
cast: Tisa Farrow|Ian McCulloch|Richard Johnson|Al Cliver|Auretta Gay|Stefania D'Amario|Olga Karlatos|Ugo Bologna|Ramón Bravo|Omero Capanna|Dakar|Giannetto De Rossi|Alberto Dell'Acqua|Arnaldo Dell'Acqua|Ottaviano Dell'Acqua|Roberto Dell'Acqua|Franco Fantasia|Lucio Fulci|Leo Gavero|Captain Haggerty|Romanokids|James Sampson|Martin Sorrentino|Leslie Thomas|Mónica Zanchi
keywords: tropical island|zombie|zombie outbreak|virus|end of the world
title: Nueva York bajo el terror de los zombi. Zombi 2
